pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: その兵士は足を負傷していて動けなかった。
lessons.english: The soldier was wounded in the leg and couldn't move.

lessons.japanese: その兵士は足を負傷した。
lessons.english: The soldier was wounded in the leg.

lessons.japanese: その戦闘で多くの兵士が負傷した。
lessons.english: Many soldiers were wounded in the battle.

lessons.japanese: その事故の犠牲者数は死者５名、負傷者１００名であった。
lessons.english: The toll from the accident was 5 persons dead and 100 persons injured.

lessons.japanese: その事故で負傷した男は病院に運ばれた。
lessons.english: The man injured in the accident was taken to the hospital.

lessons.japanese: その事故で負傷した人もいれば亡くなった人もいた。
lessons.english: Some were injured and others were killed in the accident.

lessons.japanese: 事故で負傷した乗客は最寄りの病院に運ばれた。
lessons.english: The passengers who were injured in the accident were taken to the nearest hospital.

lessons.japanese: その事故で多くの乗客が負傷した。
lessons.english: A lot of passengers were injured in the accident.

lessons.japanese: その事故で十二人が負傷した。
lessons.english: Twelve people were injured in the accident.

lessons.japanese: その事故でかなり多くの人たちが負傷した。
lessons.english: Quite a few people were injured in the accident.

lessons.japanese: その事故で１０人の人が負傷しました。
lessons.english: Ten people were injured in the accident.

lessons.japanese: その恐ろしい事故で数十人が負傷した。
lessons.english: Dozens of people were injured in the terrible accident.

lessons.japanese: その事故でその電車の乗客数人が負傷した。
lessons.english: There were a few passengers in the train who were injured in the accident.

lessons.japanese: その医者は事故で負傷した４人を救った。
lessons.english: The doctor saved the four people injured in the accident.
